conversion_verification.notes: 3D cutaway/isometric view with extruded walls, visible thickness, and readable interior volumes; ceiling/roof removed to expose rooms.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness and floor separation; good isometric angle; clean cutaway with intact geometry. Minor simplification in some wall/edge detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches: lounge/dining left, kitchen + laundry/robe center/top, bedrooms right, bath/WC central bottom, separate garage. Adjacencies and proportions largely consistent; minor discrepancies in exact opening placements/sizes and some partition lengths.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures present (sofas, beds, kitchen counters, bath/WC fixtures). Placement aligns with correct rooms; scale/orientation generally reasonable with slight simplification.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls/floors/openings are distinguishable and readable; lighting adequate. Deducted for text labels/UI-like annotations and somewhat plain/material-unified rendering.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window openings appear simplified and may not match exact 2D sizes/positions (e.g., interior door details and some glazing extents).
Text labels embedded in the 3D render (e.g., Bath, WC, Garage, LINEN) reduce presentation cleanliness.
Materials/lighting are functional but somewhat flat, reducing depth cues in a few areas.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong layout fidelity to the 2D plan, with only minor opening/detail simplifications and presentation text contamination.
